name: Phage Therapy Simulation-Discrete Events
tagline: A discrete event model that simulates interactions between co-inhabiting populations of bacteriophage lambda and bacteria.
body:
### Description
This is a discrete event model that has been developed to computationally simulate the many interactions that occur between co-inhabiting populations of bacteriophage lambda and bacteria. Model qualifications are under review for scientific publication.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
